body:
Ive read someone made an exsperiment about gold fish that keep in glass box . There is 2 room in those box separated with glass in the middle .

The gold fish put in the left side and a food fish was put to the other side.

Since the glass separate the room was transparent the fish try to get the food and hitting the glass multiple times

But after a while the fish stop and learn that it cant go there . Even tho the glass separated the room was remove it still wont get the food. And just sit still there

This is exactly what this doujin all about . At first the girl was trying to resist those bastard and when she finally learn she even ask to be violated even more XD
Well fbi bro take me away
one of the few ugly bastards nhentai i like
